mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, name, reg_date FROM new_table WHERE seq = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO new_table ( seq, title, name, reg_date )
VALUES ( seq = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_date = #{regDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE new_table
seq = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_date = #{regDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE seq = #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
